code: import React from'react';import{Page,Text,View,Document,StyleSheet}from'@react-pdf/renderer';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfessionalTemplate=_ref=>{let{data,customization}=_ref;const styles=StyleSheet.create({page:{padding:30,fontFamily:customization.font},header:{backgroundColor:customization.primaryColor,padding:20,color:'white'},section:{margin:10,padding:10,flexGrow:1}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Document,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Page,{size:"A4",style:styles.page,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(View,{style:styles.header,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:`${data.firstName} ${data.lastName}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{children:[data.email," | ",data.phone]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(View,{style:styles.section,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:"Experience"}),data.experience.map((exp,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(View,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:exp.company}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:exp.position})]},index))]})]})});};export default ProfessionalTemplate;
